name: Grass
description: Pokemon Grass is one of the three basic elemental types along with Fire and Water, which constitute the three starter Pokémon.

name: Fire
description: Pokemon Fire is one of the eighteen Pokémon Types. It is notable for being one of the three Starter types, forming a perfectly triangular relationship with Grass and Water.

name: Water
description: Pokemon Water is one of the three basic elemental types along with Fire and Gtass, which constitute the three starter Pokémon.

name: Electric
description: The Electric type is a type of Pokémon that have electricity-oriented powers.

name: Poison
description: Pokemon Poison  are immune to being poisoned (except by a Pokémon with Corrosion), and a grounded Poison-type Pokémon automatically removes Toxic Spikes on its side when it switches in.

name: Normal
description: Pokemon Normal  is one of the eighteen Pokémon elemental types. More moves are Normal than any other type; however, many of these moves are status moves that dont inflict any damage.

name: Flying
description: Flying Type is one of the eighteen types. Prior to changes in Generation IV, all damaging Flying-type moves were physical, but they may now also be special depending on the attack.

name: Bug
description: Bug moves are super-effective against: Grass Psychic Dark.
